Package theDeathNotice

Class Player

java.lang.Object
theDeathNotice.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a player in the game. This class is responsible for keeping track of the player's hand as well as the functions of each player, such as the number of times they have drawn or how many points they have.
Version:
1
Author:
Skyla

      Returns:
      time the time that the player last received points.

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints​(int pointsAdded)
      Adds a number of points to the player. Sets the time to the current time.
      Parameters:
      pointsAdded - number of points added to the field points (can be a negative number to subtract points)

    • buySaveCard

      public Card buySaveCard()
      Adds cardBought to the currentHand.
      Returns:
      cardBought the card to be added to the hand or null if no money left to buy card

    • addSaveCard

      public void addSaveCard​(Card card)
      Adds a save card to the player hand.
      Parameters:
      card - the SaveCard

    • removeSaveCard

      public boolean removeSaveCard()
      Removes a save card from the player hand.
      Returns:
      whether the player had a saving card or not

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Returns whether or not the player is alive.
      Returns:
      whether the player is alive or not

    • setAlive

      public void setAlive​(boolean alive)
      Sets the player to alive or dead.
      Parameters:
      alive - what to set the player's alive status to

    • resetDrawCount

      public void resetDrawCount()
      Resets the draw count to 0.

    • getDrawCount

      public int getDrawCount()
      Gets the number of times a player has drawn in the current turn.
      Returns:
      the number of times the player has drawn a card during their current turn

    • increaseDrawCount

      public boolean increaseDrawCount()
      Increments the number of times a player has drawn for their turn
      Returns:
      true if the current player's draw count can be increased false if the current player's draw count is already 3

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard​(CardDeck cards)
      Draws the top card from the deck of cards by adding it to the hand of the player and removing it from the card deck.
      Parameters:
      cards - the deck of cards in the game to draw from
      Postcondition:
      removes the top (index 0) card in the CardDeck of the parameter
